explanation: [0-0] The frame shows a hand with its thumb's nail inserted into the staple-loading slot of a blue stapler. On a white table sits a black box containing colorful nail art supplies.

[0-2] As the camera pans, the stapler disappears from the frame. A metal scraper appears, applying nail polish to the thumbnail. The camera then focuses on the thumbnail, where a row of staples is attached with transparent glue. Subsequently, the frame changes, showing a second row of staples glued to the end of the first row on the thumbnail.

[0-2] As the camera pans, the stapler disappears from the frame. A metal scraper appears, applying nail polish to the thumbnail. The camera then focuses on the thumbnail, where a row of staples is attached with transparent glue. Subsequently, the frame changes, showing a second row of staples glued to the end of the first row on the thumbnail.

[2-4] Afterward, the camera zooms in, and the frame changes to reveal a silver brush with yellow bristles on the right side. The brush is evenly applying white glue from the thumbnail onto the staples. The camera pans, and now the brush has covered all the staples on the nail with white transparent glue.

[2-4] Afterward, the camera zooms in, and the frame changes to reveal a silver brush with yellow bristles on the right side. The brush is evenly applying white glue from the thumbnail onto the staples. The camera pans, and now the brush has covered all the staples on the nail with white transparent glue.
[4-6] As the camera pans, a nail drill appears in the frame. The drill begins to polish the staples by moving left and right, causing some white dust to fly up.
[4-6] As the camera pans, a nail drill appears in the frame. The drill begins to polish the staples by moving left and right, causing some white dust to fly up.

[6-10] Next, the nail drill stops working, and a white nail file appears in the frame, filing the edges of the staples. Immediately afterward, the frame changes, the nail file disappears, and the staple nail art is complete. Underneath the clear nail polish of the staple nail art, sparkling sequins can be seen, and the staples are perfectly embedded within.
